title: Zwiebelkuchen (German onion pie)
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '250g quark or 0% Greek yoghurt', '1 egg', '1 pinch salt', '250g plain flour', '1 tablespoon olive oil, plus more for brushing', 'For the topping', 'olive oil for frying', '2 large sweet onions, halved lengthways and thinly sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', 'caraway seeds, to taste', '100ml double cream', '1 to 2 eggs, depending on size']
